about_the_game:
Story

You assume the role of Lyra, a strong advocate for mars-independence, who one day receives a call from her former best friend Clint. He asks you to rescue him from a research station that was thought to be abandoned. When you arrive, a story full of secrets, lies, and revelations unfolds.

Features and Gameplay

Whispers of Elysium is a deep science fiction story full of emotion, told entirely through a diverse game environment and dynamic, interactive dialog. The game is a short single-player mystery game, without action-oriented mechanics, instead focusing on its narrative.

Every decision matters!
Clint will remember every dialog option you choose, and your relationship will dynamically adapt to those choices. You shape your story!



You will:
  • Engage in interactive dialogs where you can decide what you want to talk about and which details you prefer to leave unspoken.
  • Explore the various research areas of the station and uncover their secrets.
  • Solve diverse puzzles on your way to the truth.
  • Find out how all this could be connected to Clint and what part you will play in the story.

Explore a troubled retro-futuristic world!

Humanity has established a colony on Mars and is once again facing major social and economic problems that threaten its existence. To overcome these crises, a facility on the earth ruled Mars conducted research in a variety of areas. However, the station has been abandoned in the face of recent escalation sparked by an independence movement.

You will be immersed in the dense atmosphere of the closed-down facility, which exudes a retro look reminiscent of the 1970s.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB) / Radeon RX 550 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: A former friend needs you to rescue him from an abandoned research station on Mars. Explore the station, engage in interactive dialogues and solve mysteries. What will await you?
